A kitchen stove, often called simply a stove or a cooker, is a kitchen appliance designed for the purpose of cooking food. Kitchen stoves rely on the application of direct heat for the cooking process and may also contain an oven, used for baking.
This is a range oven.
A range is a kitchen appliance used for cooking.
The oven is a thermally insulated chamber used for the heating, baking, or drying of a substance, and most commonly used for cooking.
A range is an appliance that houses a cooktop and an oven in one unit.
A stove is a heating appliance that is used for cooking or heating.
A stove is an enclosed space in which fuel is burned to provide heating, either to heat the space in which the stove is situated, or to heat the stove itself and items placed on it.
A range is a kitchen appliance that cooks food. It has an oven and a stove. Ranges are usually powered by natural gas.
